LanguageData.RD_DiscoveredStargate.label: discovered stargate
LanguageData.RD_DiscoveredStargate.letterText: You have discovered another stargate on the planet!
LanguageData.RD_IncidentRadiation.label: radiation
LanguageData.RD_IncidentRadiation.letterText: The wind has carried radioactive dust across the area. The heightened radiation levels increase the risks of severe illness even indoors, unless deep underground, enclosed in a room with a thick rock roof. You may wish to consider leaving the area until the effect has passed.
LanguageData.RD_IncidentTremors.label: tremors
LanguageData.RD_IncidentTremors.letterText: A geological disturbance is causing tremors in the area. The roof in some areas may collapse. While this is merely an inconvenience in artificial structures, it can be very dangerous under mountains.
LanguageData.RD_MalevolentAI.label: malevolent ai
LanguageData.RD_MalevolentAI.letterText: A malevolent AI has hacked your defences in support of your enemies, {0}!
LanguageData.RD_RaidEnemyQuest.label: enemy raid
LanguageData.RD_RaidStargate.label: stargate raid
LanguageData.RD_RaidStargate.letterText: A raiding party from {0} has just come through the stargate!
LanguageData.RD_RaidTeleporter.label: teleporter hack
LanguageData.RD_RaidTeleporter.letterText: The mechanoids have hacked our teleporter systems!
